name: Bullethunt
description:
Bullethunt is a small game I was originally making as a jam project, but didn't make it in time. After a while, I finished (kind of) this idea.

Models:

  • Most of the game props (furniture and stuff) - katsukagi. https://3dshed.wordpress.com/
  • Weapons - creators-sin. https://opengameart.org/users/creators-sin
  • Amazing lowpoly Muscle Car - https://t-allen-studios.itch.io/

Music:

  • Space Dimensions by Matthew Pablo - http://www.matthewpablo.com
  • Heavy Fabric by Mike Jackson - https://emjaymusic.bandcamp.com/
  • Perpetual Tension by Zander Noriega - https://soundcloud.com/zander-noriega
  • Can't Stop Waiting by yd - https://ydstuff.wordpress.com/
